docs.title: matrix-schema
docs.text:
The collected MATRIX schemas

URI: https://w3id.org/everycure-org/matrix-schema

Name: matrix-schema

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description MatrixEdge An edge representing a relationship between two nodes in the Biolink knowledge graph. MatrixEdgeCollection A holder for MatrixEdge objects. MatrixNode A node in the Biolink knowledge graph. MatrixNodeCollection A holder for MatrixNode objects.

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description aggregator_knowledge_source Aggregators of the knowledge all_categories All categories associated with the entity category Biolink category of the entity description Detailed description of the entity entries equivalent_identifiers List of equivalent identifiers for the entity id A unique identifier for a thing international_resource_identifier IRI of the entity knowledge_level Knowledge level of the relationship labels Alternative labels for the entity name Human-readable name of the entity object The object entity in the edge object_aspect_qualifier Aspect qualifier for the object object_direction_qualifier Direction qualifier for the object predicate The predicate defining the relationship primary_knowledge_source Primary source of the knowledge in the edge publications Publications associated with the entity subject The subject entity in the edge subject_aspect_qualifier Aspect qualifier for the subject subject_direction_qualifier Direction qualifier for the subject upstream_data_source Sources from which this entity's data originates

docs.title: Enumerations
docs.text: Enumeration Description

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Type: Curie
docs.text:
a compact URI

URI: xsd:string

  • base: Curie

  • uri: xsd:string

  • repr: str

docs.title: Comments
docs.text:
• in RDF serializations this MUST be expanded to a URI
  • in non-RDF serializations MAY be serialized as the compact representation

docs.title: Type: Jsonpath
docs.text:
A string encoding a JSON Path. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.

docs.title: Class: MatrixEdge
docs.text:
An edge representing a relationship between two nodes in the Biolink knowledge graph.

URI: matrix_schema:MatrixEdge

    class MatrixEdge
    click MatrixEdge href "../MatrixEdge"
      MatrixEdge : aggregator_knowledge_source

      MatrixEdge : knowledge_level

      MatrixEdge : object

      MatrixEdge : object_aspect_qualifier

      MatrixEdge : primary_knowledge_source

      MatrixEdge : publications

      MatrixEdge : subject

      MatrixEdge : subject_aspect_qualifier

      MatrixEdge : subject_direction_qualifier

      MatrixEdge : upstream_data_source
